result.markdown:
--- title: "Repeated measures and multivariate ANOVA" --- ## Content - Analysis of within-subject designs - Repeated measures and test of sphericity - Multivariate analysis of variance ## Learning objectives At the end of the session, students should be capable of - adequately modelling repeated measures - correctly interpreting tests of sphericity using software - explaining the benefits and disadvantages of repeated-measure designs - testing model assumptions in multivariate model ## Readings - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 9](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/09-repeated.html) of the course notes ## Complementary readings - {{< fa book >}} @WebPower, pages 143--148 [of the web manual](https://webpower.psychstat.org/wiki/_media/grant/webpower_manual_book.pdf) - {{< fa book >}} Chapters 11--13 of @Maxwell.Delaney.Kelley:2017. - [Chapter 5.2 ](https://opentext.wsu.edu/carriecuttler/chapter/experimental-design/) of @Price:2017 - Chapter 16 to 18 of @Keppel/Wickens:2004 ## Slides

View all slides in new window Download PDF of all slides

``` ::: ::: ## Code - [R script](/content/MATH80667A-09-content.R) - [SPSS script](/content/MATH80667A-09-content.sps) :::{.callout-tip} **Fun fact**: If you type ? (or shift + /) while going through the slides, you can see a list of slide-specific commands. :::
